comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: This is one of the special postcards made for the first U.S. air mail and shows Earle Ovington's Bleriot monoplane with 70 H.P. rotary gnome motor.  Signed by Earle Ovington and dated 11/17/35 on back.
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives
